description: Classic celery root and potato purées combine two parts potatoes with one part celery root I’ve reversed the proportion here for a lighter purée that also incorporates apple — the “secret ingredient." Rather than milk, I usually use the broth from the celery root and apples.
title: Celery Root, Potato and Apple Purée
title_page: Celery Root, Potato and Apple Purée Recipe - NYT Cooking
text: Advance preparation: You can make this up to an hour before serving. Make sure to have some extra broth or milk on hand to thin out the purée, as it will stiffen as it cools. Reheat gently on top of the stove.
